attributes.action: Stop the work from home for disabled people
attributes.additional_details: It is completely irresponsible of the government to expect the disabled to look for work, when there isn't enough jobs for the able bodied. Then you want to sanction them so the lose money. Are the government going to accept liability for the many mental health and disabled people whom may be pushed over the edge
attributes.background: Stop there latest stupid plan for the most ill or disabled people to work from home

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651861
